About Us

Our History

The Pangolins was founded by a group of passionate and forward-thinking youthful individuals who saw the untapped potential in our local talent pool. Inspired by the pangolin's resilience and adaptability, we set out on a mission to bridge the gap between investors and emerging entrepreneurs in Malawi.

Our Mission

At The Pangolins, our primary goal is to save, protect, and nurture local talents and skills in our country. We firmly believe that by empowering our youth and fostering creativity, we can drive sustainable growth and prosperity for our economy and society as a whole.

Our Vision

Our vision at The Pangolins is to see a thriving Malawian economy where local talents and skills are cherished, developed, and harnessed to their full potential. We envision a future where creativity flourishes, unemployment diminishes, and prosperity touches the lives of every citizen.

Kuphusha Ngini

Entrepreneurship Conference 2022

We proudly took the top spot among fifteen businesses at the Kuphusha Ngini Entrepreneurship Conference in 2022. The award of K1,000,000 strengthens our commitment to empowering local talents in Malawi. Together, we're creating a brighter future for our nation. Thank you for being part of our journey! üèÜ
